description: These flourless cookies are made with all natural ingredients and can be ready in minutes.
name: Almond Butter Oatmeal Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170°C/150°C fan-forced and line 2 baking trays with parchment.
Mix the almond butter, egg, maple syrup and vanilla together in a large bowl. Pour in the oats and mix well to form a sticky dough.
Using a tablespoon, scoop the dough into 18 cookies. Place on the baking trays and flatten slightly with a fork.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden. Remove from the oven and allow to cool for 10 minutes before serving.
